channel.title: Following bug and how can i do monsters hit higher?
channel.description:
Following Bug: Well everytime i press on the buttom "Follow" then i just walk up next to the player i wanted to follow and then when this player i tried to follow starting move ill just stand on the place he left from...
Monster: How can i make a kbd hit higher like it is only hitting max 10 now, i want it hit like 50

item.title: Following bug and how can i do monsters hit higher?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Go to your NPC handler and search for someting similar to this:

					[CODE]} else if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2642) {
						npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 80; //KBD
                                                   hitDiff = 7 + misc.random(40);[/CODE]

Change the

Number in

misc.random(NUMBAHERE);

(Numbahere = number of max hit)

Once u fill in numbahere thats the max hit itll hit.

Answer to the following:

You have to code following yourself, they made the right click option for follow but it doesnt actually do nyting, if you want the case for follow its:

Case 153:

In your client.java.

Read full topic
